TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that works against many types of bacteria and includes streptomycin, gentamicin, and neomycin. An aminoglycoside antibiotic is used to treat bacterial infections.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia que combate muchos tipos de bacterias e incluye estreptomicina, gentamicina y neomicina. Un antibiótico aminoglucósido se usa para tratar las infecciones bacterianas.
